Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Skills deals !D! damage to ALL enemies; NL Attacks gain !B! block; NL Powers draw !M! cards.

Master Plan.NAME: Master Plan
Master Plan.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X number of cards. Next turn, gain X - !M! [G] and draw X - !M! cards.

Improvised Strike.NAME: Improvised Strike
Improvised Strike.DESCRIPTION: Do damage equal to your hand size times !M! (excluding this card).

Risky Gambit.NAME: Calculated Gamble
Risky Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity. Heal HP equal to the number of cards in your hand (excluding this card). NL Exhaust.
Risky Gambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity. Heal HP equal to the number of cards in your hand (excluding this card).

Hasty Defense.NAME: Hasty Defense
Hasty Defense.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Thorns. Lose 1 per turn. Exhaust.
